solution_line_template: In the first {first_rounds} rounds, Brendan wins a total of {first_rounds} rounds * {matches_per_round} matches per round = <<{first_rounds}*{matches_per_round}={matches_won_first_rounds}>>{matches_won_first_rounds} matches.

In the last round, Brendan wins half of the matches which is {matches_last_round} matches / {half_divisor} = <<{matches_last_round}/{half_divisor}={matches_won_last_round}>>{matches_won_last_round} matches.

Throughout the competition, Brendan has therefore won {matches_won_first_rounds} + {matches_won_last_round} = <<{matches_won_first_rounds}+{matches_won_last_round}={total_matches_won}>>{total_matches_won} matches.
